Frequently Asked Questions

Here are answers to some common questions about where to sell old Legos.

Is it worth selling old Legos?

If you’re ready to get rid of your Legos for good and don’t feel like going through the hassle of selling them, donating them to a thrift store is a great option. Whether you have complete sets in the original box, bulk Legos, accessories, or even if they have scratches, you can most likely donate them.
